result.eng: I am not crying, I am singing.
result.ga: níl mé ag gol tá mé ag canadh
result.orig: níl mé ag gol tá mé ag canadh
result.html: níl mé ag gol tá mé ag canadhI am not crying, I am singing.
result.ponchtml: níl mé ag gol tá mé ag canaḋI am not crying, I am singing.

result.eng: Oh, I see that my son is crying.
result.ga: Ó feicim go bhfuil mo mhac ag caoineadh
result.orig: Ó feicim go bhfuil mo mhac ag caoineadh
result.html: Ó feicim go bhfuil mo mhac ag caoineadhOh, I see that my son is crying.
result.ponchtml: Ó feicim go ḃfuil mo ṁac ag caoineaḋOh, I see that my son is crying.

result.eng: It was obvious from her face that she had been crying.
result.ga: bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadh
result.orig: bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadh
result.html: bhí sé soiléir óna dreach go raibh sí tar éis a bheith ag caoineadhIt was obvious from her face that she had been crying.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé soiléir óna dreaċ go raiḃ sí tar éis a ḃeiṫ ag caoineaḋIt was obvious from her face that she had been crying.

result.eng: I remember waking up Sunday morning, crying.
result.ga: is cuimhin liom dúiseacht maidin dé domhnaigh agus mé ag caoineadh
result.orig: is cuimhin liom dúiseacht maidin dé domhnaigh agus mé ag caoineadh
result.html: is cuimhin liom dúiseacht maidin dé domhnaigh agus mé ag caoineadhI remember waking up Sunday morning, crying.
result.ponchtml: is cuiṁin liom dúiseaċt maidin dé doṁnaiġ agus mé ag caoineaḋI remember waking up Sunday morning, crying.

result.eng: Her eyes were red from how much she had been crying.
result.ga: bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aici
result.orig: bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aici
result.html: bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aiciHer eyes were red from how much she had been crying.
result.ponchtml: ḃí a ḋá ẛúil dearg ar ṁéad is a ḃí caointe aiciHer eyes were red from how much she had been crying.

result.html: sin fáth mo chaointeThat's why I am crying.
result.ponchtml: sin fáṫ mo ċaointeThat's why I am crying.
